metadata.name: Blu Lullaby
metadata.description: There is a saying: “Things that go bump in the night.” You’re supposed to be afraid, terrified. But what happens when those aren’t the only things to be afraid of? Winter and her monster under the bed Blu are agents of Safety Blanket, a secret organization that protects the world from horrors that don’t go bump in the night but are in plain sight. When a series of child kidnappings are happening throughout the town, Winter and Blu are on the case!
